    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      private java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​Feature> features
      Map to store the values, The key will store the columns names(name1, name2,...), and the value is a Feature.
      private java.util.List<java.lang.String> missingValues
      List of string that will be processed as missingValues
      private java.lang.String path
      Path where the csv is stored.
      private char sep
      Separator used to split the lines into features.

      • CSV

        private CSV​(java.lang.String path,
            char sep,
            java.util.List<java.lang.String> missingValues,
            java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​Feature> features)
     throws java.lang.Exception
        Private constructor, used to clone the object. Only calls load when features is empty
        Parameters:
        path - Path where the csv is stored.
        sep - Separator used to split the lines into features.
        missingValues - List of string that will be processed as missingValues
        features - Map with all the features identified by name
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - Raised when there are a problem reading the file or procesing the features

      • load

           throws java.lang.Exception
        Loads the data from CSV file to the instance.

      • readColumnsName

        private java.util.List<java.lang.String> readColumnsName​(com.opencsv.CSVReader reader)
                                                  throws java.lang.Exception
        Reads the columns names and store the values in the instance. For each column create the key and add a new Feature.
        Parameters:
        reader - CSVReader used to read the CSV
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - Raised when there are a problem reading the file or procesing the features

      • readValues

        private void readValues​(com.opencsv.CSVReader reader,
                        java.util.List<java.lang.String> columns)
                 throws java.lang.Exception
        Reads all values in CSV file and store them in the instance. For each line in CSV. - Check the value is in missingValues and map it to null. - Insert the value in values.
        Parameters:
        reader - CSVReader used to read the CSV
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - Raised when there are a problem reading the file or procesing the features

        Returns:
        A list where the missing values are converted to null.

      • getFeature

        public Feature getFeature​(java.lang.String name)
                   throws CSVException
        Get a feature identified by its name. If the name is not in the CSV an CSVException is raised.
        Parameters:
        name - Name of the feature
        Returns:
        A feature
        Throws:
        CSVException - Raised when the feature is not in the CSV

        Returns a CSV row identified by itÂ´s position. The row starts from 0, to rowNumbers, an exception is raised if the row is out of bound.
